title: 'Prima facie no manipulation by Adani Group': Supreme Court panel on Hindenburg report
selftext: What do you guys think? Seems to me like the 6 member panelists are gonna be rich soon.
comments: Not surprised at all,  i would have been surprised if they found something fishy.

So we're to believe that the family of known frauds has nothing to do with the absurdly high market demand for their stocks?

Prima facie one thing is clear that nothing would could come out of this until the Adani Union Government is in power.
